name: Staff of Ages
description:
-- This game has been within a 48-hour time, during Global Game Jam 2022 --

The terrible wizard Botok has become a strong tyrant reigning over his lands. Indeed he holds long life thanks to his two-colored Scepter. Suddenly a toddler arrives in his lair and steals the Scepter to stir up trouble and unleash the fury of the wizard's henchmen. Between aging and rejuvenation, our toddler now has a great responsibility!

------------Controls------------

Q = move left
D = move right

Space = jump / Sauter
Left click = rejuvenating
Right click = aging beam

Some enemies need to be older or younger in order to die. You can also apply the beam on trees to make a path.

The goal is to finish the level without getting killed. Find your way through the dungeon and escape with the Staff of Ages!
